sentences.sContent: We want to announce the reorganization of our firm. But the service will be continued.
sentences.sContent_eng: We want to announce the reorganization of our firm. But the service will be continued.
sentences.sCn: 我们想通知你方我方改组了。但是我们的服务不变。

sentences.sContent: Preliminary achievements were made in the adjustment of some of the major industries through reform, reorganization and transformation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Preliminary achievements were made in the adjustment of some of the major industries through reform, reorganization and transformation.
sentences.sCn: 通过改革、改组、改造，对一些重要行业进行了调整，取得了初步成效。

remMethod.val: re(再) + organiz(组织) + ation → 改组

words.tran: 重组（reorganize的过去分词）；整顿；重新制定
